current.title: Current settings for autopublish
current.desc:
These are the current Autopublish settings of this Server.
Use `{{prefix}}autorole [subcommand]` to change them.

current.title: Текущие настройки для автороли
current.desc:
Это текущие настройки автороли этого сервера.
Используй `{{prefix}}autorole [subcommand]`, чтобы изменить их.

autorole.invalidRole: Идентификатор роли, который вы предоставили, некорректный, используйте команду roleid, чтобы получить её идентификатор

backup.warning: :warning: Всё серверные каналы, роли и настройки будут очищены. Хотите продолжить? Отправьте `confirm` или `cancel`!
backup.dm: Here is your backup id: `{{id}}`. Use `{{prefix}}backup load {{id}}` to load it
backup.created: Сохранение создано! Я отправил тебе идентификатор в личные сообщения.

current.title: Current settings for chatbot
current.desc:
These are the current Chatbot settings of this Server.
Use `{{prefix}}chatbot [subcommand]` to change them.

enable.notDisabled: Эта команда не была отключена, поэтому не делаем ничего

follow.cmdDesc: Получать новости и обновления версий этого бота, отправленные в определенный канал.

current.title: Текущие настройки логов прощания
current.desc:
These are the current Goodbye logs settings of this Server.
Use `{{prefix}}goodbye [subcommand]` to change them.

lang.invalid: Invalid locale, send {{cmd}} to get a list of locales available.

current.title: Текущие настройки логов модерации
current.desc:
Это текущие настройки логов модерации этого сервера.
Используй `{{prefix}}modlogs [subcommand]`, чтобы изменить их.

set.channel: Канал логов на сервере установлен на {{channel}}

current.title: Текущие настройки для серверных логов
current.desc:
Это текущие настройки логов этого сервера.
Используй `{{prefix}}serverlogs [subcommand]` чтобы изменить их.

current.title: Current settings for welcome logs
current.desc:
These are the current Welcome logs settings of this Server.
Use `{{prefix}}welcome [subcommand]` to change them.

invalid.channel: The channel you provided is invalid

hug.cmdDesc: Give a hug to a user

waifu.cmdDesc: Выбирает случайную Вайфу и показывает её.

report.view: Вы можете просмотреть это на сервере поддержки Welcome-Bot в канале <#{{chanid}}>.

suggest.view: Вы можете просмотреть это на сервере поддержки Welcome-Bot в канале <#{{chanid}}>.

vote.cmdDesc: Проголосуй за Welcome-Bot и забери бонусные WCoin'ы (500 WCoin'ов)
vote.title: Проголосовать за Welcome-Bot

howToVote.dbl: **[Голосуй на Top.gg]({{link}})**, чтобы забрать свой бонус.
howToVote.bls: **[Голосуй на botlist.space]({{link}})**, чтобы забрать свой бонус.

vote.howToVoteServer: **[Голосуй на Top.gg за сервер Welcome-Bot]({{link}})**, чтобы получить другой бонус.
vote.alreadyVoted: Вы уже проголосовали в последние 12 часов, попробуйте ещё раз позже.

balance.cmdDesc: Проверить свой или чужой баланс. Показывает кошелёк и банк
balance.title: Баланс {{user}}

chances.failed: О бедный нищий, тебе не стыдно :question:
chances.success: Вау... Похоже, ты умеешь общаться с людьми :people_hugging:, ты получил {{wcoins}} за попрошайничество
chances.little: Вам как-то удалось выпросить {{wcoins}} у бедного человека :bearded_person:

buy.cmdDesc: Buy items which are available in the shop
buy.notAvailable: Мне жаль, друг, но этот предмет не может быть продан
buy.noMoney: У тебя нет достаточно денег, чтобы купить это! Проверь магазин

daily.success:
{{wcoins}} WCoins were placed in your wallet!

You can get more rewards by voting! (vote command for more info)
daily.dailyClaimed: You have already claimed your daily money. Try again in {{duration}}

deposit.notAvailable: Woah... You don't have that much money in your wallet!
deposit.noSpace: Woah... You don't have space to deposit that money!
deposit.noMoney: Hey! You don't have anything in wallet to deposit
deposit.missingAmount: The amount you specified is Not a Number or you did't specify the amount to deposit.
deposit.title: Money deposited

gift.cmdDesc: Donate some items to another user
gift.title: Donated item!

give.title: Donated money!
give.success: {{mention}} You gave {{user}} {{amount}}, now you have {{yourWallet}} and they've got {{userWallet}}

inventory.cmdDesc: Shows yours or some one else's inventory
inventory.noItems: You don't have anything in your inventory

profile.cmdDesc: Shows your profile or someone else's.
profile.title: Profile of {{tag}}

rob.notEnoughMoney: У тебя должно быть минимум 200 WCoin'ов в твоём кошельке, чтобы оградить кого-то
rob.userNotEnoughMoney: User {{tag}} doesn't have at least 200 in their wallet, it's useless to steal them.
rob.failed: You were caught by the police when stealing and you lost {{lostCoins}}

use.notAnItem: What are you thinking fool? There is no item like that or it is not usable item
use.youDontHaveAny: Hmm, wait... Looks like you don't have any of those
use.tooMuch:
Hey!
You don't have {{count}} {{item}}(s) in your inventory

withdraw.notAvailable: Woah... You don't have that much money in your bank!
withdraw.title: Money withdrawed
withdraw.noMoney: Hey! You don't have anything in bank to withdraw
withdraw.isNegative: Woah! The number you gave is negative, I won't help.

8ball.cmdDesc: Get your fortune by asking your question

coinflip.done: I've flipped a coin and it landed {{chosenSide}}

figlet.cmdDesc: Implement the FIGfont spec in JS
figlet.error: Your text has to be smaller than 20 characters

pokemon.error: Oh! Could not find that Pokemon

addemoji.cmdDesc: Add emoji from a image link
addemoji.nameMissing: Emoji name is missing, please type `{{cmd}}` for help
addemoji.invalidName: The length of the emoji name must be between 2 and 32!
addemoji.error: {{emojiName}} couldn't be added. Check whether your server still has space for new emojis!

userid.cmdDesc: Get a id of a user

help.cmdDesc: List all commands or get info for a specific command/category.
help.all: List of all commands available in the bot

listemojis.cmdDesc: List of all custom emojis in this server, with there IDs.

perms.cmdDesc: Get permissions given to a specific user. Not providing any user mention will show your permissions

qrcode.cmdDesc: Generate or Read a QR code

stealemoji.error: {{emojiName}} couldn't be added. Check whether your server still has space for new emojis!

testwelcome.welcomeDisabled: Welcome logs are disabled and can't be tested right now.

testgoodbye.goodbyeDisabled: Goodbye logs are disabled and can't be tested right now.

user.cmdDesc: Get information about a user. It will show your info if no user was mentioned

version.cmdDesc: Get information on a version or latest version

ban.mySelf: Please don't try to ban me, you have to do it yourself.

dehoist.cmdDesc: Dehoist users that are trying to hoist

kick.mySelf: Please don't try to kick me, you have to do it yourself.

mute.errorYourself: Woah... Wait. Can you mute yourself?
mute.memberHasPerm: The member you are trying to mute has {{permission}} permission. So, I won't mute that member
mute.DMtext:
You have been muted by {{tag}}.
For reason: {{reason}}

unmute.notMuted: That member is currently not muted
unmute.DMtext:
You have been unmuted by {{tag}}.
For reason: {{reason}}

prune.cmdDesc: Prune Messages. Add a -f option in the end to delete pinned messages also!

back.pleaseVote: More than half members in the voice channel must react with 👍 to go to the prevoius music! {{count}} more votes are required.
back.success: Went back to the prevoius song
back.failure: An error occurred, When going back to the prevoius song.

loop.pleaseVote: More than half members in the voice channel must react with 👍 to set loop mode! {{count}} more votes are required.
loop.invalidMode: Invalid loop mode provided, type `{{prefix}}help loop` for help. You have provided {{mode}}
loop.failure: An error occurred, When setting loop mode.

np.cmdDesc: The details of song which is being played now

play.cmdDesc:
Play music on channel.
You must join a voice channel before using this command.
play.cantJoin: Could not join your voice channel!
play.voiceNotJoined: ❌ Please join a voice channel before using this command
play.missingSongName: You didn't provide me the song name to start playing
play.voiceChanDiff: Пожалуйста, присоединитесь к тому же голосовому каналу, в котором находится бот
play.playlistStart:
Starting playlist **{{playlistTitle}}**.
Playing the first song, **{{songName}}**! :musical_note:
play.botDisconnected: Music has been stopped as I have been disconnected from the voice channel.
play.noResults: The bot can't find any song like that :cry: [Note: Now we only support spotify]
play.queueEnd: Queue has been ended. No more music to play :musical_note:...
play.rateLimited: Sorry, I can't play the song as I am rate limited
play.destroyedQueue: The queue was destroyed, abd I can't play music using that queue. Please create a new queue from play command
play.playlistAdded: Playlist "{{playlist}}" has been added to the queue. ({{songs}} songs)
play.forbidden: I am forbidden to play that song, will try to play some other song that matches

seek.cmdDesc: Go forward or backward a specific amount of time in the current song!!
seek.invalidTime: You must specify a valid number of time!

skip.pleaseVote: More than half members in the voice channel must react with 👍 to skip the music! {{count}} more votes are required.
skip.failure: An error occurred, When skiping the current song.

stop.notPlaying: No songs are currently playing in this server.
stop.pleaseVote: More than half members in the voice channel must react with 👍 to stop the music! {{count}} more votes are required.

volume.cmdDesc: Adjust the volume of the music
